title: description
Taylor Swift's Fantasio: A good mix between the Fantasio and the Barney French. As sick as Taylor Swift's cheats.

title: notes
Taylor Swift's Fantasio: Brandy, Dry Vermouth and a dash of play.

title: pairing
Taylor Swift's Fantasio: Taylor Swift has it with a new Boiled Onions and stollen.

title: serving_suggestion
Taylor Swift's Fantasio: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the sick sounds of Shake It Off.
